long_description: Ready for hard-charging adventures, the women's Marmot Macy Shirt is moisture-wicking and quick-drying so you can relish the freedom of the trail in comfort. Dri-release(R) polyester/cotton blend offers breathable comfort and permanent moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance. FreshGuard(R) fabric treatment absorbs moisture and quickly pushes it through the fabric into the air to minimize odor creation. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection. Flexible flatlock seams and a tag-free neckline prevent irritation on skin. Marmot Macy Shirt for women features a scooped boat neck, cap sleeves and spaced-dyed textured knit fabric. Closeout.
short_description: Ready for hard-charging adventures, the women's Marmot Macy Shirt is moisture-wicking and quick-drying so you can relish the freedom of the trail in comfort.
